Verses: 1 rekobeyaam Raajyaththaith Thidappaduththith Thannai Balappaduththikkondapin, Avanum Avanode Isravelaranaivarum Karththarudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththai Vittuvittaargal.

2 avargal Karththarukku Virodhamaai Yuththampanninapadiyinaal, Raajaavaagiya Rekobeyaamin Aindhaam Varushaththil Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Seeshaak Aayiraththu Irunooru Radhangalodum, Arubadhinaayiram Kudhiraiveerarodum Erusalemukku Virodhamaai Vandhaan.
3 avanodekooda Egipthilirundhu Vandha Loobiyar, Sookkiyar, Eththiyoppiyaraana Janangal Ennikkaikku Adangaadhavargalaayirundhaargal.
4 avan Yoodhaavukku Aduththa Aranaana Pattanangalaip Pidiththu, Erusalemmattum Vandhaan.

5 appozhudhu Semaayaa Theerkkadharisi Rekobeyaamidaththukkum Seeshaakkinimiththam Erusalemile Vandhu Koodiyirukkira Yoodhaavin Prabukkalidaththukkum Vandhu, Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ennaivittuvitteergal, Aagaiyaal Naan Ungalaiyum Seeshaakkin Kaiyile Vizhumpadi Vittuvitten Endru Karththarsollugiraar Endraan.
6 appozhudhu Isravelin Prabukkalum Raajaavum Thangalaith Thaazhththi: Karththar Needhiyullavar Endraargal.

7 avargal Thangalaith Thaazhththinadhaik Karththar Kandapodhu, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Semaayaavukku Undaagi, Avar Sonnadhu: Avargal Thangalaith Thaazhththinaargal, Aagaiyaal Avargalai Azhikkamaatten; En Ukkiram Seeshaakkaik Kondu Erusaleminmel Ootrappadaadhapadikku, Avargalukkuk Konjam Sagaayaththaik Kattalaiyiduven.
8 aanaalum Ennai Sevikkiradharkum, Anniya Dhesangalin Raajyangalai Sevikkiradharkum Irukkira Viththiyaasaththai Avargal Ariyumpadikku Avanai Sevikkiravargalaavaargal Endraar.

9 appadiye Egipthin Raajaavaagiya Seeshaak Erusalemukku Virodhamaai Vandhu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Pokkishangalaiyum, Raajaavudaiya Aramanaip Pokkishangalaiyum, Saalomon Seyviththa Ponparisaigalaagiya Sagalaththaiyum Eduththukkondupoivittaan.
10 avaigalukkup Padhilaaga Raajaavaagiya Rekobeyaam Vengalap Parisaigalai Seyviththu, Avaigalai Raajaavin Vaasarpadiyaik Kaakkira Sevagarudaiya Thalaivarin Kaiyil Oppuviththaan.
11 raajaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkul Pravesikkumpodhu, Aramanai Sevagar Vandhu, Avaigalai Eduththukkondupoi, Thirumbath Thangal Araiyile Vaippaargal.
12 avan Thannaith Thaazhththinapadiyinaal, Karththar Avanai Muzhudhum Azhikkaadhapadikku Avarudaiya Kobam Avanaivittuth Thirumbitru; Yoodhaavile Innum Sila Kaariyangal Seeraayirundhadhu.

13 appadiye Raajaavaagiya Rekobeyaam Erusalemile Thannaith Thidappaduththikkondu Arasaandaan; Rekobeyaam Raajaavaagirapodhu Naarpaththoru Vayadhaayirundhu, Karththar Thammudaiya Naamam Vilangumpadi Isravel Koththirangalilellaam Therindhukonda Nagaramaagiya Erusalemile Padhinezhu Varusham Raajyabaarampanninaan; Ammon Jaadhiyaana Avanudaiya Thaayin Per Naamaal.
14 avan Karththaraith Thedugiradharkuth Than Irudhayaththai Neraakkaamal Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan.

15 rekaabeyaamin Aadhiyodandhamaana Nadapadigal Semaayaavin Pusthagaththilum, Gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya Iththovin Vamsa Attavanaiyilum Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu; Rekobeyaamukkum Yerobeyaamukkum Sagala Naalum Yuththam Nadandhukondirundhadhu.
16 rekobeyaam Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Adakkampannappattaan; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Abiyaa Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
